entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
